attributes.action: allow the police to confiscate mobile phones of people caught using them whilst driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a more effective deterrent/stiffer penalty to using a hand held mobile phone whilst driving the police should have the power to confiscate handsets from people caught using them whilst driving.

This could also be linked to a system that would prevent issuance of a crime number to stop the offender from initiating a lost/stolen mobile phone insurance claim.
